description:
## Thinkful - Logic Drills: Traffic light
You're writing code to control your town's traffic lights. You need a function to handle each change from *`green`*, to *`yellow`*, to *`red`*, and then to *`green`* again.

Complete the function that takes a string as an argument representing the current state of the light and returns a string representing the state the light should change to.

For example, when the input is *`green`*, output should be *`yellow`*.

testSuite.name: Update light from red to green
Update light from green to yellow
Update light from yellow to red

description:
## Square Sum
Complete the square sum function so that it squares each number passed into it and then sums the results together.

For example, for **`[1, 2, 2]`** it should return **`9`** because **`1^2 + 2^2 + 2^2 = 9`**.

## The highest profit wins!
 ### Story
Ben has a very simple idea to make some profit: he buys something and sells it again. Of course, this wouldn't give him any profit at all if he was simply to buy and sell it at the same price. Instead, he's going to buy it for the lowest possible price and sell it at the highest.

### Task
Write a function that returns both the minimum and maximum number of the given list/array.

### Examples (Input --> Output)
`[1,2,3,4,5] --> [1,5]`

`[2334454,5] --> [5,2334454]`

`[1]         --> [1,1]`
### Remarks
All arrays or lists will always have at least one element, so you don't need to check the length. Also, your function will always get an array or a list, you don't have to check for null, undefined or similar.

## Disemvowel Trolls
Trolls are attacking your comment section!

A common way to deal with this situation is to remove all of the vowels from the trolls' comments, neutralizing the threat.

Your task is to write a function that takes a string and return a new string with all vowels removed.

For example, the string "This website is for losers LOL!" would become "Ths wbst s fr lsrs LL!".

**Note**: for this *`y`* isn't considered a vowel.

testSuite.name: disemvowel('This website is for losers LOL!')
testSuite.expected: Ths wbst s fr lsrs LL!

testSuite.name: disemvowel('No offense but, Your writing is among the worst I've ever read')
testSuite.input: 'No offense but, Your writing is among the worst I\'ve ever read'
testSuite.expected: N ffns bt, Yr wrtng s mng th wrst 'v vr rd
